meanings.definition: Serving as a prototype or model
meanings.sent1: The prototypic design of the new car impressed the engineers.
meanings.sent2: Her prototypic behavior set a high standard for the team to follow.
meanings.sent3: The prototypic robot decided to take a dance break during the experiment.
meanings.sent4: His prototypic leadership style was a guiding light for the company.
meanings.sent5: The prototypic sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues of orange and pink.

meanings.definition: Typical of a particular class or group
meanings.sent1: The prototypic student in the class always arrived early and prepared.
meanings.sent2: The prototypic house in the neighborhood had a white picket fence and a garden.
meanings.sent3: The prototypic cat in the shelter loved to play hide-and-seek with visitors.
meanings.sent4: Her prototypic outfit for the party was a little black dress and heels.
meanings.sent5: The prototypic flower in the garden bloomed brightly in the spring sunshine.
